# OR where

To combine conditions using `OR`, you can use the expression builder:

// THIS IS AN AUTO GENERATED FILE.
// CHANGES TO THIS FILE WILL BE LOST
// SEE: /scripts/generate-site-examples.js
import {
  Playground,
  exampleSetup,
} from '../../../src/components/Playground'

import {
  orWhere
} from './0030-or-where'

<div style={{ marginBottom: '1em' }}>
  <Playground code={orWhere} setupCode={exampleSetup} />
</div>

:::info More examples
The API documentation is packed with examples. The API docs are hosted [here](https://kysely-org.github.io/kysely/)
but you can access the same documentation by hovering over functions/methods/classes in your IDE. The examples are always
just one hover away!

For example, check out these sections:
 - [where method](https://kysely-org.github.io/kysely/classes/SelectQueryBuilder.html#where)
 - [whereRef method](https://kysely-org.github.io/kysely/classes/SelectQueryBuilder.html#whereRef)
:::
